channel.title: connectivity on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in connectivity on Barefoot Rob

item.title: bah my phone is slow
item.description: 20:08 Sunday 30 July 2017 JST My phone is a slow as year 2000 internet; I guess it is throttle because I went over the allotted bandwidth. bah. If that’s true, I wonder what put me so far over the limit this month.
